model

Class Holding

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Company
      • model.Holding

  • public class Holding
extends Company
    Models a holding i.e. a company that owns other companies.
    Author:
    Mateo Valdes

      • Fields inherited from class model.Company

        Class constructor.

        post: The companies ArrayList is initialized

        Parameters:
        nam - The company's name
        nt - The company's NIT
        addr - The company's address
        phone - The company's phone number
        employeeN - The company's number of employees
        assetVal - The company's asset value
        dateF - The date that the company was founded
        typ - The type of company
        legalR - The name of the legal representative

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Sets up the variables requiered to evaluate the proper execution of the program.

        post: A new TechCompany is added to the list of companies
        post: A new MedicationCompany is added to the list of companies
        post: A new EducationCompany is added to the list of companies
        post: A new building is added to the TechCompany
        post: A new building is added to the MedicationCompany
        post: A new building is added to the EducationCompany
        post: A new employee is added to the EducationCompany
        post: A new employee is added to the MedicationCompany
        post: A new employee is added to the TechCompany
        post: Various surveys are now registered in the TechCompany and the EducationCompany

      • registerFoodCompany

        public void registerFoodCompany(java.lang.String nam,
                                java.lang.String nt,
                                java.lang.String addr,
                                java.lang.String phone,
                                int employeeN,
                                double assetVal,
                                java.lang.String dateF,
                                java.lang.String typ,
                                java.lang.String legalR,
                                java.lang.String sanitationR,
                                boolean valid,
                                java.lang.String expD,
                                java.lang.String cat,
                                boolean koshr,
                                boolean bpaC)
        Adds a new food company to the holding's list of companies

        post: a food company is initialized and added to the holding's companies ArrayList

        Parameters:
        nam - The company's name
        nt - The company's NIT
        addr - The company's address
        phone - The company's phone number
        employeeN - The company's number of employees
        assetVal - The company's asset value
        dateF - The date that the company was founded
        typ - The type of company
        legalR - The name of the legal representative
        sanitationR - The sanitation registry of the company
        valid - Whether the sanitation registry of the company is currently valid
        expD - The expiration date of the sanitation registry of the company
        cat - The category of the company
        koshr - Whether the company has a kosher certificate
        bpaC - Whether the company has a BPA certificate

      • registerEducationCompany

        public void registerEducationCompany(java.lang.String nam,
                                     java.lang.String nt,
                                     java.lang.String addr,
                                     java.lang.String phone,
                                     int employeeN,
                                     double assetVal,
                                     java.lang.String dateF,
                                     java.lang.String typ,
                                     java.lang.String legalR,
                                     int regNum,
                                     int aYears,
                                     int sRank,
                                     java.lang.String pName,
                                     java.lang.String eduSector,
                                     int aStudents,
                                     int s12Students)
        Adds a new education company to the holding's list of companies

        post: an education company is initialized and added to the holding's companies ArrayList

        Parameters:
        nam - The company's name
        nt - The company's NIT
        addr - The company's address
        phone - The company's phone number
        employeeN - The company's number of employees
        assetVal - The company's asset value
        dateF - The date that the company was founded
        typ - The type of company
        legalR - The name of the legal representative
        regNum - The registry number of the company given by the National Education Ministry
        aYears - The number of years the company has been accredited
        sRank - The Saber11/SaberPro rank
        pName - The name of the principal
        eduSector - The education sector that the company is in
        aStudents - The total number of active students within the company
        s12Students - The number of stratum 1 and 2 students in the company

                                double ec,
                                boolean[] s)
        Adds a new tech company to the holding's list of companies

        post: a tech company is initialized and added to the holding's companies ArrayList

        Parameters:
        nam - The company's name
        nt - The company's NIT
        addr - The company's address
        phone - The company's phone number
        employeeN - The company's number of employees
        assetVal - The company's asset value
        dateF - The date that the company was founded
        typ - The type of company
        legalR - The name of the legal representative
        ec - The energy consumed by the company (in kilowatts)
        s - An array of the services the company performs

        Parameters:
        nam - The company's name
        nt - The company's NIT
        addr - The company's address
        phone - The company's phone number
        employeeN - The company's number of employees
        assetVal - The company's asset value
        dateF - The date that the company was founded
        typ - The type of company
        legalR - The name of the legal representative
        sTyp - The type of service the company provides
        tSubs - The total number of subscribers the company has
        s12Subs - The number of stratum 1 and 2 the company has

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String with all the important available attributes and information of this company. Includes the information inherited from its superclass.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Company

        A String with all the available attributes of this company

      • showSurveyQuestions

        public java.lang.String showSurveyQuestions()
        Displays all the survey questions defined in the class Survey
        Returns:
        A String listing all the survey questions

      • doSurvey

        public java.lang.String doSurvey(java.lang.String nit,
                                 int a,
                                 int b,
                                 int c)
        Fills out a survey in the service company with the NIT entered. If the company cannot be found or the survey cannot be completed, it notifies the user that the survey could not be done successfully.
        Parameters:
        nit - The NIT of the company whose survey is going to be registered
        a - The answer to the first question
        b - The answer to the second question
        c - The answer to the third question
        Returns:
        A String notifying the user whether the survey was successfully registered

      • addProduct

        public java.lang.String addProduct(java.lang.String nit,
                                   java.lang.String nam,
                                   java.lang.String cod,
                                   double waterQ,
                                   int unts)
        Adds a product to a fabrication company with the NIT entered. If the product cannot be added, it notifies the user.
        Parameters:
        nit - The NIT of the fabrication company whose product will be added
        nam - The name of the product
        cod - The code of the product
        waterQ - The water quantity (in liters) needed to manufacture the product
        unts - The amount of units of the product available
        Returns:
        A message indicating whether the product was added successfully

      • reportTrees

        public java.lang.String reportTrees()
        Gives a report of the trees that all applicable companies in the holding must plant.
        Returns:
        A string with the names of all the companies that must plant trees and how many trees they must plant

      • reportProculturaTax

        public java.lang.String reportProculturaTax()
        Gives a report of all applicable companies in the holding that must pay procultura tax and their tax percentage.
        Returns:
        A string with the names of all the companies that must pay the procultura tax and the percentage they must pay

      • reportAvgConsumerSatisfaction

        public java.lang.String reportAvgConsumerSatisfaction()
        Gives a report of the average consumer satisfaction of all the service companies in the holding. The service companies must first register their surveys.
        Returns:
        A string with the average consumer satisfaction of all the service companies

                                    int floors)
        Adds a building to the company with a specified number of floors
        Parameters:
        nit - The NIT of the company whose building will be added
        floors - The number of floors in the building
        Returns:
        Whether the buidling could be added to the company successfully

        Parameters:

        mode - The mode of search (L, Z, X, O, E, row spiral and column spiral)
